entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then flurries at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
